name: path-to-hs
description: A website that calculates a student's chances of getting into different Chicago Public Schools high schools.

scripts.deploy:production: aws s3 sync build/ s3://chavez-hs-planner.com --acl public-read --delete
scripts.deploy:dev: aws s3 sync build/ s3://path-to-hs-dev --acl public-read --delete
scripts.deploy-cps-remote: ssh -t rlangworthy@10.129.210.11 'sudo rm -r /var/www/hs-planner/* /home/rlangworthy/repos/chavez-hs-planner/build/*' && scp -r ./build/* rlangworthy@10.129.210.11:/home/rlangworthy/repos/chavez-hs-planner/build && ssh -t rlangworthy@10.129.210.11 'sudo rsync -rtv /home/rlangworthy/repos/chavez-hs-planner/build/ /var/www/hs-planner/ && sudo restorecon -R /var/www/hs-planner'
scripts.scrape-programs: cd scraper && pipenv run python main.py ./raw-data/School_Locations_SY1718.csv

author: Michael Ingram
